body.raw:
# Big Zeus Energy

## Best Debut Show - Leicester Comedy Festival (nominated)

"Masculinity is in crisis. The men's circle is calling and we're heading deep into the forest to find our Big Zeus Energy. Clown and Physical comedy. Nominated for BEST DEBUT SHOW at LEICESTER COMEDY FESTIVAL 2023. "A loud, bombastic, hyper macho parody of the modern man. It's bizarre and beautiful." ***** - The Crumb. "It’s very funny, delightfully charming and has a real spirit of the fringe vibe. ****" - Mumble Comedy."

The debut show from the clown group 'Big Zeus Energy'. Developed between 2022 and 2023 with assistance from Aitor Bassauri (SpyMonkey). The show was performed at Leicester Comedy Festival in 2023 and 2024, as well as Brighton Fringe, Edinburgh Fringe and a number of venues across Europe.

body.raw:
# The Jazz Man

(Live performance & YouTube Series)

'What is Jazz?' is a comedy web series. Be enlightened by a man described by some as 'The Prophet of Jazz'. The Jazz Man shares clips from his Online Course, whilst struggling to get anyone to distribute it, and give it the audience it deserves. 

'The Jazz Man' is a live comedy character develped by Christiaan Hendriksen. During the COVID-19 lockdowns, Christiaan created a short web series converting some of the live content into videos, to give him something to do and not lose his mind. It achieved one of these goals.

::iframe{src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/2mTAhwvKDXw" width="100%" height="560" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen}
::

body.raw:
# Treeeee

## Best Show nominee – UK Kids Comedy Festival 2025.

Embark on a hilarious and heartwarming journey into the life of a tree with Treeeeee, a captivating mix of physical comedy and environmental storytelling.

This show spans the 500-year life of a tree in just 50 minutes. The performance brings the natural world to life through expressive movement, music and audience interaction, creating a magical experience for audiences of all ages. Performed by Christiaan Hendriksen, Sketch Off finalist 2025 and Best Debut Show nominee Leicester Comedy Festival 2023.

Audience Reviews:

> "Treeeeee. A poetic journey in the life of a Tree. The performer, Chrisitaan Hendriksen was gentle and funny. I was not expecting to be as moved as I was. I enjoyed the journey and hope it can continue to grow. No pun intended, check it out before it's too late!"

> "If you’re considering taking a punt on this, do it, you won’t regret it. Unique."
body.html:
Treeeee

Best Show nominee – UK Kids Comedy Festival 2025.

Embark on a hilarious and heartwarming journey into the life of a tree with Treeeeee, a captivating mix of physical comedy and environmental storytelling.

This show spans the 500-year life of a tree in just 50 minutes. The performance brings the natural world to life through expressive movement, music and audience interaction, creating a magical experience for audiences of all ages. Performed by Christiaan Hendriksen, Sketch Off finalist 2025 and Best Debut Show nominee Leicester Comedy Festival 2023.

Audience Reviews:

"Treeeeee. A poetic journey in the life of a Tree. The performer, Chrisitaan Hendriksen was gentle and funny. I was not expecting to be as moved as I was. I enjoyed the journey and hope it can continue to grow. No pun intended, check it out before it's too late!"

"If you’re considering taking a punt on this, do it, you won’t regret it. Unique."

body.raw:
# Waiting for Freedom

Currently in Post-Production, Christiaan is directing a feature Documentary about the life and work of Philippe Gaulier. 

More information coming soon.

body.raw:
# Werewolves of London

"From the creators of Big Zeus Energy (nominated for Best Debut Show 2023, Leicester Comedy Festival; sell-out five-star show, Edinburgh Fringe 2023) a new work-in-progress clown and physical-comedy show that may be about werewolves. Praise for previous shows: 'A loud, bombastic, hyper-macho parody of the modern man. It's bizarre and beautiful' ***** (TheCrumb.co.uk). 'It’s very funny, delightfully charming and has a real spirit of the fringe vibe' **** (MumbleComedy.net)."

The second show from the group Big Zeus Energy, performed at Brighton Fringe, Edinburgh Fringe, Leicester Comedy Festival, Prague Comedy festival and further shows across Europe.
